about_the_game:
3dSen VR

emulates and transforms NES titles across all genres from all-time classics to deep RPGs; arcade action, shooters, beat ’em ups, puzzlers, old favourites and hidden gems into 3D voxel dioramas.

Highlight Features

  • Ever growing list of supported retro classics and modern homebrew
    Included but not limited to Super Mario Bros, PunchOut!!, Duck Tales, Mega Man, Contra, Metroid, Legend of Zelda series, Final Fantasy, Duck Hunt, Dragon Warrior, Batman, Castlevania, Battle Kid, Micro Mages.
  • Support both Virtual Reality and Desktop modes
  • Support Mixed Reality mode when using Meta Quest headsets
  • Input lag rivals original NES console
  • Motion controller as zapper/light gun
  • Full motion control support for PunchOut!!
  • User friendly VR UI with both Laser Beam and Gaze control methods
  • Dynamic Skyboxes
  • Export game view to external 3D file
  • Cover art customization

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Gtx 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Gtx 970
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: 3dSenVR emulator offers beautiful hand-crafted dioramas versions of the most cherished 8-bit NES classic titles. Immerse yourself in the old school gaming world, now magically transformed into 3D space that will please the most hardened devoted retro fan alike.
